basics.label: Chef
basics.summary: Dedicated Customer Service Representative motivated to maintain customer satisfaction and contribute to company success.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Responsible for the preparation of 2 daily snacks and lunch for 150 children. Required to create a balanced menu along with catering to child specific medical and religious restrictions. Continuously maintained above par menu and stayed within an established budget. Highly organized, time sensitive and creative.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Assisting customers in the purchases. POP inputting. Creating an overall experience to create returning customer base. Customer service, product knowledge and computer skills.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Worked a liaison between membership and management to ensure all requirement where meet for a satisfying experience at a golf/tennis/pool facility. Was continuously asked to manage private and company events due to hard work and commitment to excellence. Ordered beverages to maintain sufficient stock, scheduled staff, and excellent customer service.
